tool_input.old_string:
FROM rustlang/rust:nightly

WORKDIR /app
RUN apt update && apt install lld clang -y
COPY . .
ENV SQLX_OFFLINE=true
RUN cargo build --release
tool_input.new_string:
FROM rustlang/rust:nightly

WORKDIR /app
RUN apt update && apt install lld clang -y
COPY . .
ENV SQLX_OFFLINE=true
# Limit codegen units to reduce memory usage during compilation
ENV CARGO_BUILD_JOBS=1
ENV CARGO_INCREMENTAL=0
RUN cargo build --release -j 1

todos.content: Fix the recursion limit error in SQLx compilation

tool_input.description: Build Docker image with recursion limit fix

todos.content: Fix the recursion limit error in SQLx compilation
Test the Docker build to ensure it compiles successfully

tool_input.content:
FROM debian:bookworm-slim
WORKDIR /app
RUN apt-get update -y \
    && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates \
    && apt-get autoremove -y \
    && apt-get clean -y \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
COPY target/release/zero2prod zero2prod
COPY configuration configuration
ENV APP_ENVIRONMENT production
ENTRYPOINT ["./zero2prod"]
